name: NexTraq
overview:
NexTraq®, a leading GPS fleet and asset tracking company, provides an innovative and cost-effective solution that helps businesses manage their day-to-day fleet-related activities and increase profitability. By combining the industry’s most reliable GPS solution and hardware offering, NexTraq’s easy-to-use, cloud-based solution provides valuable insight into where employees, vehicles and assets are located 24/7, allowing businesses to gain a better understanding of their fleet operations.

With more than 37 reports and 23 real-time alerts, dispatching and scheduling capabilities and a mobile app for both iOS® and Android™, NexTraq offers the most comprehensive product suite on the market. From small and medium-sized businesses to larger organizations, NexTraq has a solution that can be customized to meet any customer’s needs. With the NexTraq GPS Fleet Tracking platform, businesses can:

• Increase Revenue • Decrease Labor Costs • Decrease Fuel Costs • Manage Safety and Compliance • Automate Asset Maintenance

We are proud of the fact that NexTraq’s operations, including design, manufacturing, sales and support, are located in the U.S. Based in Atlanta, NexTraq customers achieve ROI in as little as one month.
